text: Bassecourt is a former municipality of the district of Del√©mont in the canton of Jura in Switzerland. On 1 January 2013 the former municipalities of Bassecourt, Courfaivre, Glovelier, Soulce and Undervelier merged to form the new municipality of Haute-Sorne. ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Former municipalities of Jura Category:2013 disestablishments in Switzerland
